chinese: 老耿端起枪，眯缝起一只三角眼，一搂扳机响了枪，冰雹般的金麻雀劈哩啪啦往下落，铁砂子在柳枝间飞迸着，嚓嚓有声。
english: Old Geng picked up his shotgun, squinted, and pulled the trigger. Two sparrows crashed to the ground like hailstones as shotgun pellets tore noisily through the branches.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Old Teng raised his gun and looked up at a pair of triangular eyes, cocking the trigger and the shot rang out, like thunderclaps as if it were raining down from the sky. The bullets flew across the branches of the trees like cannonballs, cracking and clinking with a loud sound.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Old Geng raised his rifle, squinted his eyes, and fired. A crisp sound erupted when the rifle barrel clicked shut, sending crumpling peas splashing through the air, shards of metal shooting through the branches, like shattered sandstones.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Old耿拿起枪，眯着眼睛一搂扳机就响了枪，金麻雀噼里啪啦的往下掉，铁砂子在柳枝间飞溅，发出“嚓嚓”的声音。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Old Geng raised his pistol, squinted, and fired: bang! The shooting sprays of goldbird shot swept down toward him, while streaks of red-hot ironseed began flying through the air between the willows and splatting noisily to the ground.

chinese: 次日天未明时，刘老老便起来梳洗了， 又将板儿教了几句话； 五六岁的孩子，听见带了他进城逛去，喜欢的无不应承。
english: Next day Grannie Liu was up before dawn. As soon as she had washed and done her hair, she set about teaching Ban-er a few words to say to the ladies at the great house – an exercise to which he submitted cheerfully enough, as would any little boy of four or five who had been promised an outing to the great city.

She instructed Ban-er in a few words of the language of the city and, making him promise his simple assent to all these assertions, brought him out with her to go shopping.

chinese: 钱老板道：“是，是，多谢香主。” 在一张椅上坐了，续道：“属下将小郡主藏在猪肚里带进宫来，一来是为瞒过宫门侍卫的重重搜检，二来是要瞒过沐王府众人的耳目。
english: 'Thank you, Master,' said Butcher Qian, seating himself in one of the chairs and continuing. 'There were really two reasons why I hid the Little Countessinside this pig's carcass. One was to get her past the Palace Guard: they always search everyone at the gate. But it was also to get her past any of the Mu Family spies who might be out watching for us.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Money, do you say? Yes, I am grateful." The money man sat down on a chair. He continued his speech, "The underling has been hidden in the pig's belly in the palace and brought in as a prisoner, so that it will hide behind the eyes of the guards in the palace and the ears of the people in the royal family.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Any more, sir,' said the butcher. He sat down on a chair and began his account. 'At any rate,' he added after a silence, 'to summarize everything I told you before: first of all I concealed this little princess in one of the pig's feathers and inside him was the room by hiding it among other chickens in the palace; secondly, I wanted to hide my family from the guards at the gate and the people within the Palace so that they couldn't discover our secret.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Boss Qian said, "Yes, yes, thank you." He sat on a chair and continued, "I brought my little princess into the palace through the belly of a pig. One reason is to avoid being searched by the palace guards; another reason is to avoid arousing suspicion among the沐王府众人."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Of course,' said Butcher Qian eagerly. He sat himself down in a chair and continued: 'I took the Little Countess to live in my pigs' belly when I came here from the Palace. First of all it was to avoid being searched by the Palace guards; but mainly so that I could keep it from people like the Mu Family.

chinese: 但已经晚了，物理学家静静地躺在地上，半睁的双眼看着从他的头颅上流出的血迹，疯狂的会场瞬间陷入了一片死寂。

chinese: 夫妻二人半世只生此女，一旦失去，何等烦恼，因此昼夜啼哭，几乎不顾性命。 看看一月，士隐已先得病，夫人封氏也因思女构疾，日日请医问卦。
english: The shock of so sudden a loss to a middle-aged couple who had only ever had the one daughter can be imagined. In tears every day and most of the night, they almost lost the will to go on living, and after about a month like this first Shi-yin and then his wife fell ill, so that doctors and diviners were in daily attendance on them.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Half a century ago, they had a daughter. But now if this becomes their only child, what kind of trouble would it cause? So every day they weep for her in the morning and at night, even disregarding their lives. Look at one month, Master Su’ang is already ill with illness, and Miss Fang also has thought of bringing her to see a doctor and consult her.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: In these early days before their marriage her offspring had just been born. At the time the present balance of life was岌岌有危，然而自此至今日夜不停不止的哭诉，一直到了士隐不在了之后，女儿已经名正言顺、寄胎在府上；至于妻母何者可忍, 而如何能令二老受苦? 他们每日夜班地去请大夫作诊，家中的琐事也都全权由庶子带路去说理。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: A couple married for half a lifetime had one daughter, and when they lost her, how much trouble they would have! They would weep day and night, almost losing their lives. After a month, Mr. Xing was already ill, and Lady Shen also became sick because of thinking about her daughter.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The husband and wife had now reached their middle twenties and were still the rightful owners of a little girl; the thought of parting with her at any stage caused them such sorrow that they were weeping for almost every day. The younger was so ill that his wife fell ill too, because she could not bear the sight of the two of them grieving for their lost child.

chinese: 虽然我奶奶与他已经在高粱地里凤凰和谐，在那个半是痛苦半是幸福的庄严过程中，我奶奶虽然也怀上了我的功罪参半但毕竟是高密东北乡一代风流的父亲，但那时奶奶是单家的明媒正娶的媳妇，爷爷与她总归是桑间濮上之合，带着相当程度的随意性偶然性不稳定性，况且我父亲也没落土，所以，写到那时候的事，我还是称呼他余占鳌更为准确。
english: Even though by then he and Grandma had already done the phoenix dance in the sorghum field, and even though, in the solemn course of suffering and joy, she had conceived my father, whose life was a mixture of achievements and sin (in the final analysis, he gained distinction among his generation of citizens of Northeast Gaomi Township), she had nonetheless been legally married into the Shan family. So she and Granddad were adulterers, their relationship marked by measures of spontaneity, chance, and uncertainty. And since Father wasn't born while they were together, accuracy demands that I refer to Granddad as Yu Zhan'ao in writing about this period.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Although my grandmother is also a harmonious couple with him on his side of the rice field, and in that solemn and solemn period where they were both sorrowful and happy together, I do not have any charge, but it was indeed a proud father of the highland East of the Northern Plains, but then it was just a single man's marriage ceremony as a wedding partner, and there was quite a degree of randomness and instability. Moreover, I did not come from soil yet, so I called him "Luo Xue Qing" more accurately when writing about the things at that time.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Even though my grandma had already been blossoming in the sorghum fields under the direction of her father, who was a single man from Northeast Gaomi Township, where she was a married man who at once shared pain with me and at the same time compensated Granddad for his crime, she still held a certain elegance and refined refinement in those highland northeast villages where, when the soil rested on her head, she was a married wife who, having been adopted, felt at once relief and annoyance toward my grandfather. Also, despite the fact that he hadn't born any children, by which time it was already possible to call him Cousin Amtu more appropriately.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Although my grandmother had been harmoniously married with him in the field of corn, she was still happily pregnant at that time, but despite her being a half-dirty, half-fortunate father, I should call her a single house wife who was engaged in marriage by the family. My grandfather had been married to her as well, so it was not very stable or fixed, and even though my father hadn’t fallen off the earth yet, I shouldn’t use his name.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Even though Grandma had consummated her love for Yu Cang in the sorghum field, reaching harmony and happiness, she remained a half-crazed, half-cursed child born of a father who walked among the gourd fields of Northeast Gaomi Township — a man who, like his father before him, had been tied to his wife and loved unconditionally. But Grandma was not a virgin; she had not fallen into debt to society. So, even when it came time to write about this period in her life, I called her by the name of her father, Yu Cang.

chinese: 这些人嘴里尊称自己是香主，满口什么静候香主吩咐云云，其实各人肚里早就有了主意，只盼得到自己赞同，于是一切便推在韦香主头上，日后他们就不会担当重大干系。

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: It is their elders who stand as祭司口头的神甫, who tell us what to do in accordance with his commands. unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: These people, who call themselves "masters" and say such things as "waiting for a master's orders", really have their own minds already. chinese: 雨打倒了无数的高粱，雨在田野里狂欢，蛤蟆躲在高粱根下，哈达哈达地抖着颌下雪白的皮肤； 狐狸蹲在幽暗的洞里，看着从高粱上飞溅而下的细小水珠，道路很快就泥泞不堪，杂草伏地，矢车菊清醒地擎着湿漉漉的头。

The dew covered its path， making mud slippery and tangled. The fox sat inside the dimly-lit hole， looking at the falling drops from the beans as they fell like tiny specks of snow. The tulip bush had been standing upright when it woke up and was now dripping wet with a wetting head.

The cornflowers stand up, their heads drenched by wet whisks.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The rain beat down on countless corn stalks, raining down in the fields, frogs hiding in the roots of the corn, shaking their white skin with a dance; foxes huddled in the dark cave, watching the tiny drops that fell from the corn stalks, soon making the road muddy, weeds lying flat, daisies awake holding wet heads.

chinese: 它原先是一片蛮荒地，荆榛苇茅丛生，狐狸野兔的乐园，后来有了几架牧人的草棚，后来逃来了杀人命犯、落魄酒徒、亡命赌棍…… 他们建造房屋，开垦荒地，拓扑出人的乐园，狐狸野兔迁徙他乡，临别时齐声发出控诉人类的鸣叫。
english: At one time the site had been a wasteland covered with brambles, underbrush, and reeds, a paradise for foxes and wild rabbits. Then a few huts appeared, and it became a haven for escaped murderers, drunks, gamblers, who built homes, cultivated the land, and turned it into a paradise for humans, forcing out the foxes and wild rabbits, who set up howls of protest on the eve of their departure.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The land was once a place of wilderness, where thorns and moss covered the ground, where foxes and rabbits roamed, and there were some wooden huts for the shepherd's wives to live in. But over time, they built a few houses, then came up with a few more, and then a few more, until they had all left their mark on people's lives. The foxes and rabbits migrated from one place to another, each calling out a cry of human distress.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Before then the place was nothing but ditches, willows, and foxes, herons, and weasels. Some monks had built cottages. Then traffic had come from farmers' huts, and lastly ruthless gamblers and thieves had run away, promising a place of death for anyone who crossed their path. The deer and foxes had fled to other parts, calling out curse words as they flew toward the destructed houses and turned back to see their human hosts.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: It was once a wild land of thorns, willows, and reeds, home to foxes and rabbits. But after that came several tents for farmers, then some fugitives from crime, outcasts from drinking, and gamblers who had run away from their lives… They built houses and cultivated the land, creating human gardens where foxes and rabbits migrated, and as they left, they all cried out against humanity.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: A desolate wilderness once covered with bushes, sorghum, and reeds, it was home to foxes and rabbits until a few scattered huts were built by farmers and cultivated by settlers. english: Trinket could feel the scholar's strong hands on his arms. A warm sensation passed through his body, followed by a little tremor of excitement. He abandoned his kowtow and got up.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Wu Zai Ba was tripped by him and suddenly he felt hot all over his body. He could not accept it.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Trinket suddenly felt a sudden shivering and his warmth was abruptly lost: he had successfully thwarted the request, but there was no credit for it both ways.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Wu Xiaogang's arms were suddenly hot, causing him to shiver as he bowed down.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Trinket brayed back, but the warm embrace had given him a shudder and sent him straight back on his haunches.

chinese: 后来人保组的同志找我商量，说是要开个大的批斗会。
english: After a while, the security comrades came to talk to me, telling me about the big denouncement meeting they were going to hold.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The group of former People's Insurance Group members approached me and said they were planning a big rally.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: After a while, the public security comrade sent me over to meet them. He said he wanted to call a big denouncement meeting.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Later, people from People's Insurance Group came to talk with me about a big scolding meeting.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Later on, the public security comrades came to discuss organizing a large struggle session.

chinese: 烦那位太爷替我请他出来。”
english: Could I trouble one of you gentlemen to fetch him out for me?'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I beg you to please send him out here on my behalf.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I'm begging the old man to bring him in to hear me'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Please ask that old man to bring him out."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Now I ask you to take this gentleman out of here.'

chinese: 我先孝敬了母亲，赶着就给你们老太太、姨母送了些去。 如今留了些，我要自己吃恐怕折福，左思右想除我之外惟你还配吃。
english: I've given some of the stuff to Mother, and while I was about it I sent some round to your grandmother and Auntie Wang, but I've still got a lot left over. I can't eat it all myself: it would be unlucky. But apart from me, the only person I can think of who is worthy to eat a present like this is you.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I first gave my mother respect and then I brought some for her, so I have left a little for you. I am afraid that I will eat it myself if I don't eat it right away, so I wonder who is still left to me, and what should be eaten by others besides me.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I took the time to attend her mother's funeral,' I told you, 'and brought a bit or two back with me. Now they've got a supply themselves. I'd hoped to keep them all for themselves, but now that my temps have run out I can't afford it. It'll be some from one or two other gentlemen who serve at your太太's wedding if we haven't any left.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I first treated my mother well before sending some gifts to your aunt and grandmother. Now I have kept a few for myself as I think it would be a loss of merit to eat them. All other people are not suitable except you.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I offered first as yet nothing was due to my mother; then went to give some to Lady Wang and my Auntian. What remained I kept for myself; but since eating it would involve me in sin, I engaged my thoughts on how to distribute it so as not to offend Heaven. Finally I decided that since it was for my own benefit only that I chose not to take any of it, I should give it to old Lady Wang's husband.

chinese: 村里街道上也水深及膝，骡马牛羊都泡在水里，水上漂着牲畜们稀薄的排泄物。
english: The water in the village was knee-high, covering the legs of livestock, whose waste floated on the surface.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Water was deep enough for a knee-high horse and mule and all the animals were soaking up the sewage from the water.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The streets were filled with water – at least six feet. Shefeng, mules, donkeys, and flocks of goats threw their stink as far away as possible.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The streets of the village were flooded up to their knees with water as well. Cattle, horses, and sheep were floating in it, while the feces from their urine was floating on top of the water.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: On the streets of the village, the water was as deep as people's ankles, and mules, horses, and buffalo swam around in it until it was covered with their excrement.

chinese: 我在一边看完了才走。
english: I didn't leave until I witnessed the whole episode.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I have watched a movie on one side before I left.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I finished reading my story before I left and walked away from here.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I finished watching before I left.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I finished reading it when I saw it.

chinese: 低头看去，宽阔笔直的马路上跑着如豆的汽车，成串的亮珠子。
english: Below, the cars speeding down the straight broad roads looked like a chain of pearls.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Looking down at them, there were like a dozen cars running on that straight road, each with a bright pearl shining from it.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: As he looked down, a broad road was crossed by endless buses, connected by litters of watches.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Look down; the wide straight road is filled with small cars moving in rows of light beads.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: But as he looked更低，他看见宽阔平坦的道路上飞舞着千百颗汽车灯，一列长的汽车像无数明亮的串联珍珠在行驶。

chinese: 成名如此之早，当真古今罕有。”
english: To have won such fame, and so early in life too, is an almost unparalleled achievement.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: It was so early for him that he had never seen anything like it before."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: And he did, apparently, during his lifetime, '
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Such a great success at such a young age is truly unprecedented in history."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: To be named after so young an age is indeed rare indeed.'

chinese: 待雄飞高举，明冬再晤，岂非大快之事！”
english: How delightful it will be to meet again next winter when you have distinguished yourself by soaring to the top over all the other candidates!'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Wait for his flight to take him up high, then we will meet again next winter. Is this not a great thing!"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The sight of him soaring high above the frost-free air and meeting up with her again in the clear winter days to pursue their shared desire... that sounds like a very satisfying affair.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Wait for the king to fly high and meet again in the winter!"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: When you are ready to carry your flight, I shall expect to see you again soon in the winter.'

chinese: 纵声大笑，身子跟着乱动，右腿一曲，右手已抓住了匕首柄，极慢极慢的从剑鞘中拔出，不发出丝毫声息，就算有了些微声，也教笑声给遮掩住了。
english: He kept up the artificial laughter in order to cover up the wriggling of his body. While he was talking and laughing he had managed to draw up his right leg so that he could get his hand on the dagger in his boot and draw it from its sheath. Any slight sound that this operation might have given rise to was masked by his idiotic cachinnation.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Quietly laughing, his body moved as if he was following a song. He raised his right leg and grasped the handle of the knife, slowly and carefully from the sheath of the sword. There was no sound when he pulled out the blade, not even a single sound. Even if there was a slight noise, it would be drowned out by the laughter.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: He let out a great loud cry, and gave way to wild movements which made his right leg turn aside; then he drew his dagger from his sheath and picked it suddenly out of it. He allowed none of the noises that should be made, although they seemed almost imperceptible, to掩盖他的欢声笑闹。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Laughing loudly, he moved about wildly with his body, bending his right leg and grasping the handle of the dagger with his left hand. He slowly extracted it from its scabbard, making no sound at all, even if a whisper could be heard. Even a faint sound would be covered up by the laughter.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: He began laughing loudly; his body started rolling from side to side, as he withdrew the dagger and held it tight between palm and hand. It was a very gradual and meandering motion, so that even if the sound of his breathing had been heard, it would have been more than outweighed by the noise of his big grinning smile.

chinese: 他似乎没听见。 我劈手把牛鼻绳夺了下来，他就朝我挥了一巴掌。
english: He didn't seem to hear me, so I snatched the tether from him and he slapped me without thinking.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: He did not hear me. I took the bull's nose chain from him, and he gave a slap at me.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: He didn't hear me, though. I ripped the stork harness from him and he gave me a slap.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: He didn't seem to hear me. I snatched the ox's snare out of his hands, and he slapped me across the face with a palm.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: He didn't seem to hear me; I snatched the leach-patron rope from him and he swiped at me with a palm.

chinese: 世界是平的，向各个方向延伸到很远很远，但总是有边的。
english: The world was flat and extended very far in each direction, but ultimately there was an edge where it met the sky.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The world is flat, stretching out from every direction, but always there is a border.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The world is flat, always there somewhere.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The world is flat, extending far and wide but always with edges.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The world is flat, extending far and wide in all directions; but it never seems to end.

chinese: 其实我们随时可以逃走，但她不乐意。
english: Actually, we could have left anytime, but she didn't want to.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Actually we can always run away, but she doesn't want us to.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: We could have run away anytime, but she didn't want to.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: We could always run away, but she didn’t want to.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: We could have run away any time, but she said it wasn't fun anymore.

chinese: 后来人家又不怀疑我们去了国外，开始对她比较客气，经常叫她到医院去，给参谋长看前列腺炎。
english: Later on they stopped suspecting we had gone abroad. They began to deal with Chen Qingyang in a more civilized way, often asking her to go to the hospital and treat the prostatitis of the chief of staff.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Later, when she did not doubt that we had gone abroad, they began to be more polite towards her and often called her to the hospital to see what was wrong with her prostate gland.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Eventually, she didn't suspect us to go abroad, and after graduation she began to treat us more kindly; regularly we were sent by the Dojiao General to look at her prostate, and she even let us call her 'the doctor' when she wanted to.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Later, they started treating her with respect because we were abroad. They would often take her to the hospital for checkups and have her see the doctor about her prostate problems.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: After a while, they started to believe we'd left China and became more polite toward her, often taking her to the hospital to check on her husband's prostate problem.

chinese: 急的霍启直寻了半夜， 至天明不见，那霍启也不敢回来见主人，便逃往他乡去了。
english: Frantically he searched for her throughout the rest of the night; but when day dawned and he had still not found her, he took to his heels, not daring to face his master and mistress, and made off for another part of the country.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I was so angry that I went to bed at night and never saw him again, but he didn’t dare come back either. So he left his home and went to a place far away from here.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: In a state of constant anxiety, Hong:i) called out to someone through the window at midnight; ii) let nobody come to see him until dawn, afraid to show his face again because of the brightness; and iii) fled to some place somewhere in the daytime.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Hou Qi straight searched all night long but he didn’t see him until morning. He didn’t dare return home either so he fled away.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Night and day he scoured the streets for her, but by the time however he had ascribed his failures, but in any case he ran away and disappeared into the ether.

chinese: 那男孩反手抓住他右腿使劲一扯，韦小宝仰面便倒。
english: The boy quickly grabbed his right leg and tugged at it, sending Trinket crashing down on his back.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The boy grabbed his right leg with both hands and pulled him down on one knee.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The boy grabbed him by his right leg and twisted hard. Trinket fell straight back on the floor.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The boy caught his right leg with his backhand and pulled hard. He fell over onto his back.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The boy spun round, grabbed his leg with his other hand and twisted, sending him tumbling over the side of the well.

chinese: 王琦瑶听了这话又是一笑，仰起脸看了严师母说道：我这样的人，还谈什么结婚不结婚的话呢？
english: Wang Qiyao responded with another laugh. Raising her head, she looked Madame Yan straight in the eye. 'A woman like me. . . . How could I talk of marriage?'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Ou Xi is laughing again when he hears what she said. He looked at Mrs.严先生问道：“What about getting married or not? ”
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Wang Qiyao laughed at her.举起头向严家师母说:What do you talk about marrying if you don't want to marry?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Wang Qiuyue smiled again and looked up at the aunt. I am such a person, how can I talk about marriage?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Wang Qiyao smiled up at Madame Yan. 'How can I get married if I'm not certain of my status?' she thought to herself.

chinese: 她承认她那天心情非常激动，确实像考拉熊。
english: She admitted that she was very excited that night and really felt like a koala bear.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: She admitted that she was very excited that day, indeed like a Kangaroo bear.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: She admitted she was so excited that she looked like a pug dog that had just been roasted.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: She admitted that she was very excited on that day and it was like a koala bear.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: She admitted that she was very excited that day, indeed, she was like a koala bear.

chinese: 我们村子的历史又翻开了新的一页。
english: A page in the history of our village had been turned.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Our village has just begun its new chapter.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: A brand-new chapter in the history of our village is being opened every time we read this page.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Our village's history has opened a new chapter.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The history of our village had turned a new page.

chinese: 这是深入肌肤，已经谈不上是亲是近，反有些起腻，暗底里生畏的，却是有一股噬骨的感动。
english: This is a feeling that, having penetrated the flesh, goes beyond closeness. One begins to weary of it. It breeds a secret fear, but hidden within that fear is an excitement that gnaws down to the bone.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: This is skin deep, not flesh close or near. It's a little off, but it's a very intense feeling of biting. It's lurking inside, but there's a strong feeling of gnawing.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: It is deeper than the skin on your body, though it might not have been the deepest and the neatest of a place; a place you still feel repulsive even when it is never near. The feeling that grips you holds you back even when you have nothing at all to hold it against.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: This is skin-deep, not so much close as it is intimate, but it's a bit repulsive, a kind of fear that has built up in my heart, and yet there's this burning sense of emotion.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: This intimacy is not merely reciprocal; it is corrosive, instilling in you a fear of depth but also prompting a response, perhaps the most surprising.

chinese: “昨天高密大集，有去赶集卖草鞋的没有？”香色呢礼帽又问。

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Did anyone sell grass shoes at the high-mine market yesterday?' the chestnut-brown hat asked.

chinese: 其为崖山以后耶？ 如此江山不忍视。
english: Or is it after Mount Yai's fateful leap? This lovely land then scarce dared breathe its name.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: It is a matter of which city is after Shannan? Such a beautiful land is not to be overlooked.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: It is after Huaishan? How can I bear to look at this land.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Is this part of the Yüan-shan Expedition? The like scenery makes one want to weep.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Why didn't he go and report to the Emperor?

chinese: 忽然灯光一闪，只见贾蔷举着个蜡台，照道：“谁在这屋里呢？”
english: Suddenly a light flashed --- and there was Jia Qiang holding aloft a candle in a candlestick which he shone around: 'Who is in this room?'

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: A thin blanket of sunlight had already fogged up the windows, and on the window pane, which measured about a手掌宽, were etched bizarre patterns of frost.

chinese: 父亲跟着队伍进了高粱地后，由于心随螃蟹横行斜走，脚与腿不择空隙，撞得高粱棵子东倒西歪。
english: As Father followed the troops into the sorghum field, he moved sideways, crablike, overshooting the spaces between the stalks and bumping them hard, which caused them to sway and bend violently.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: As his father entered the fields of rice, his heart was driven by a crab that was zigzagging along and going straight, causing him to hit the trees and leaves on the stalks of the field.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: After Father joined his队伍, because his heart traveled above the surface of the river like a crab grappling for freedom, he wandered off into the sorghum field — inadvertently — scattering clumps so far away he couldn't have noticed how they were shifting somewhere else.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: After his father followed the army into the cornfield, he walked around aimlessly as if he were a crab, his feet and legs wandering all over the place. The stalks of corn bent left and right.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: After Father followed the队伍进入高粱地时, because his mind was focused on the scurrying crabs, his body wandered wherever they went, knocking over sorghum stalks left and right.

chinese: 蕊初道：“我…… 我在这里玩儿！”
english: 'I'm just. . . just playing,' said Blossom.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Ah, I'm here playing!"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I... I think I can't get here.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Rui Culi said, "I … I'm here playing!"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I... I'm here to play!'

chinese: 那文士提笔蘸上了墨，在纸上写了个“鹿”字，说道：“鹿这种野兽，虽是庞然大物，性子却极为平和，只吃青草和树叶，从来不伤害别的野兽。
english: The man picked up a writing-brush and moistened it on the ink-slab, then, on a sheet of paper, he wrote the character for a deer. 'The deer is a wild animal, but although it is comparatively large, it has a very peaceable nature. It eats only grass and leaves and never harms other animals.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The writer wrote "鹿" on the paper with ink, saying: "A wild beast is huge but very calm; it eats grass and leaves and never harms other wild beasts."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The man drew a '鹿' with his finger on the水墨。 'This creature,' he said, 'can't compare directly with other furs. It eats grass and trees and never plans to hurt others.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The scholar dipped his brush into ink and wrote a "deer" on the paper and said, "Although this wild beast is big, its disposition is very gentle. It eats grass and leaves only, never attacking other beasts."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The man dipped a brush in the inkwell and wrote a deer on the sheet of paper. 'Although this huge animal—is he not a monster?—he is very gentle-natured. He only eats grass and leaves. Never does he harm other animals.

chinese: 可此时她只是一个豁出去，反倒是很镇定，竟能注意到周围，听见有邻近棚里传出来的“开麦拉”的叫声。
english: But having decided to let everything ride, she was actually quite calm and composed. She was aware of everything going on around her, down to the shouts of 'Camera' coming from the adjacent set.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: At this moment, she was just daring enough to do so, but very calm. She could see that there were voices coming from another room, "Squealing of a wheat field".
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: But now she was taking the lead, more relaxed than nervous, and even noticed that a voice was calling 'Camera' in the direction of her patch of tents from inside another tent.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: At this moment, she was just willing to risk it all, and could even notice around her as if there were a microphone nearby.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: But at that moment she decided to just let herself be swept away and found herself much calmer than the others. She could even hear the call 'Camera' from the neighboring tent.

chinese: 我把这事说了出来，以为陈清扬一定不记得。
english: When I mentioned this to Chen Qingyang, I thought she'd have forgotten.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I said this out loud, hoping that Chen Quanping would never remember.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I told her this, thinking she'd forget about it, realizing later that she probably wouldn't.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I told him about this and hoped that Chen Qingyang wouldn't remember.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I told Chen Qingyang what I had done and thought she would remember.

chinese: 侧过了头倾听。
english: He cocked his head to listen.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I listened from behind my head.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: She turned her head away and listened.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Turning aside to listen.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: She turned her head and listened.

chinese: 余占鳌对着劫路人笔直地走过去，他薄薄的嘴唇绷成一条刚毅的直线，两个嘴角一个上翘，一个下垂。
english: Yu Zhan'ao approached the highwayman, his thin lips curled resolutely, up at one end and down at the other.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Mr. Zhang walked straight ahead of the robber, his thin lips drawn straight as a line of strength, two set of eyebrows rising and falling.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Yu Zhan'ao followed the highwayman across the street, his brow紧紧绷住对方凶狠的脸面。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Yu Zhanao walked straight past the robbers as he did so, his thin lips forming a hard line. His two upper lips curled up while his lower ones dropped.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Yu Zhan'ao walked up to the highwayman straight as an arrow; his thin lips formed a rigid bridge. For a moment they翘了起来, then drooped.

chinese: 平儿站在炕沿边，打量了刘老老两眼，只得问个好，让了坐。
english: Patience, who was standing by the edge of the kang, made a rapid assessment of Grannie Liu and judged it sufficient to greet her with a civil 'how-do-you-do' and an invitation to be seated.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Pai Guo'er stood on the edge of the炕边， looking at them both with cold eyes. She had to ask for a good morning and let them sit down.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Patience looked down at Grandmother Liu, puzzled by her appearance, and making a call for business before finishing her cup of tea, who had been sitting nearby.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Ping'er stood at the foot of the bed, looking at Liu Laoer two times, finally greeted him with a good word, and let him sit down.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Patience stood by the kang, scouted Grannie Liu with a glance, and then, taking a seat on the edge of the kang opposite her, began to speak.

chinese: 桥墩就可以用作拉丝的柱子。”
english: The abutments at the two ends of the bridge can serve as the pillars for stringing the filaments.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: A bridge can be used as a column for wire rope.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: We could use a bridge pillar as a rope support.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The bridge piers can be used as columns for the wire rope."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: So you can use the pillars at the ends of the abutments for the twisting wire fabric.'

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I was the one who didn't.

chinese: 我说，既然你不愿意见它，那就算了。
english: I said, since you don't even want to look at him, let's just forget the whole thing.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I said, since you don't want to see it, then let's just go with it.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I said If you don't want to see her, then you shouldn't worry about it.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I said that if you don't want to see it, then let's just leave it alone.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I said, Since you don't want to see it, that's fine with me.

chinese: 爷爷走着，他已经感觉不到自己的腿在何处，只是凭着一种走的强烈意念，在僵硬的空气的浊浪中，困难地挣扎。
english: All that kept Granddad moving was a powerful drive to push on and continue the bitter struggle against wave after murky wave of obdurate air.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The grandfather walks, feeling no longer that his legs were at home but rather that he was walking with a strong will in a foggy sea of air.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Granddad went walking杖不离手，那感觉已极微妙,在他思想的硬壳中,顽强的空气努力向前冲。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Grandfather walked; he no longer knew where his legs were, but he was struggling against a strong urge to walk through thick, foggy air.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: He no longer knew where his legs were; all he had was a strong will to keep walking, through impenetrable air currents swirling relentlessly around him.

chinese: 海老公脸一沉，说道：“借给老吴这小子有什么用？
english: Old Hai scowled at him. 'What do you want to go lending money to that Wu fellow for?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: His face dropped as he said, "What does it do for you to lend this guy?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The old eunuch appeared impatient. 'What does having a pair of gloves for for work really mean?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The sea cucumber's face sank as he said, "What good is it for you to lend this to a kid like that?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The old eunuch gave a deep sigh. 'I hope Old Wu isn't using it for something nasty.

chinese: 如果发生你所说的超过百分之一振幅的波动，这条线就会变红并将波动显示出来。
english: If the kind of fluctuation you anticipate—in excess of one percent—occurs, this line would turn red and become a waveform.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: If the wave you describe exceeds 1% of its peak amplitude, this line will turn red and display the wave.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: If you mentioned an amplitude less than one percent that went above the band, this line would turn red and show what happened.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: If a fluctuation of more than 1% occurs, this line will turn red and display the fluctuation.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: If, by the percentage variations you're talking about, a line changes color and displays the fluctuation, that's what we call 'seeing.'

chinese: 如今出挑的美人儿似的，少说着只怕有一万心眼子；再要赌口齿，十个会说的男人也说不过他呢！
english: She's grown up to be a real beauty too, has Mrs Lian. But sharp! Well, if it ever comes to a slanging match, she can talk down ten grown men any day of the week!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Now she is a kind of woman who makes you want to say something but can't say it because there's only one mouth that speaks to her; then, if she wants to bet words, ten men would not be able to explain him!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Those on the cusp of adulthood must know by now that being a beautiful one is no sign of intelligence; besides, even those men who aren't very clever will try to argue with them about it anyway, because they know how important it is.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Now that she is out on her own, she may have a thousand wits; even if you talk with her for ten minutes, no man can talk with her more than one hundred times!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: A young beauty like this is a very dangerous asset. If we gambit her, ten men would be hard put to it to keep up with her; and if we don't gamble, we've still got to be able to speak fluently, and nobody can speak better than a lady like her.

chinese: 我办过一个盗窃案，罪犯能把行驶中的列车中间的一节车厢偷了，前后的其余部分又完好地接起来开到终点站，用的工具只是一根钢丝绳和几只铁钩子。
english: I once handled a robbery where the criminals managed to steal one car out of a moving train. They reconnected the cars before and after the one they were interested in so that the train got all the way to its destination without anyone noticing. The only tools they used were a length of wire cable and a few steel hooks.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I committed a theft once, and the criminal could steal from the middle of the train, and the other parts were perfectly intact after that, using tools just one piece of steel rope and several iron hooks.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I committed a robbery several times. The robber would steal a section of the trainbeds from the back, put on the front, and keep the entire shipbuilding building from turning up at the end, with tools just a raw stock of steel chains and some iron hooks.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I had done a robbery where the thief was able to steal one compartment of a train while the rest were intact and reconnected at the end station using just a piece of wire and some iron hooks.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I solved a theft case where the perpetrator had moved a section of the train between stations with no one noticing.

chinese: 老耿那时已七十多岁，孤身一人，享受“五保”待遇，是村里德高望重的人物，每逢诉苦大会，都要他上台诉苦。 每次诉苦，他都要剥掉上衣，露出一片疤痕。
english: Old Geng, who was already over seventy by then and lived alone as a pensioner, was one of our most revered villagers. Asked to speak at meetings to air grievances against the old order, he invariably stripped to the waist onstage to show his scars.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: In old age, when he was seventy years old, he was alone on his own. He was a respected figure of the village, and whenever someone complained about something, he would be called up to speak. Every time they complained, he would peel off his clothes revealing a scar.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Old Geng was a seventy-year-old man, alone and single, who enjoyed the welfare grant of "five resides," given to poor elders and retired men on镇政府的德高望重的人物。 Whenever they met for恳职大会，他就要扒了衣服，露出了疤。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Lao Ge was seventy years old then, alone, enjoying "Five Guarantees" benefits, a person of great respect in the village, he would always be asked to speak at the meeting. At each meeting, he would take off his shirt, exposing a scar.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Old Geng had been alone all his life, enjoying five-star benefits as a village veteran. Every month he attended a meeting where he was required to complain. Every time, he took off his shirt, revealing the rows of scars covering his back.

chinese: 我走过去，告诉他，这牛被毒蛇咬了，不能干活。
english: I went over to tell him that the buffalo had been bitten by a poisonous snake and couldn't work.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I walked over and told him that the horse had been bitten by a snake. He couldn’t work.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I walked over to告诉他：那头牛已经被毒蛇咬住了。不能再干活了。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I walked over and told him that the ox had been bitten by a snake and could not work any longer.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I went over to tell him that the bull had been bitten by a snake and couldn't do any work.

chinese: 这天下午，程先生提前下班，买了菜到王琦瑶处，两人将孩子哄睡了，便一起忙了起来，一边忙一边说话。
english: On the afternoon of the dinner Mr. Cheng left work early to pick up the food for that evening. They put the baby to bed early and chatted as they cooked.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: This evening, Mr. Chen bought vegetables at Ouyang Guoran's house and then took them home together. He was busy talking as he prepared food for the children.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: On the way home, Mr. Cheng took some soup to warm Wang Qiyao's child while she slept; they both lay down together, talked as much during their dinner time as they could manage, and then changed into clothes and headed out of the apartment building.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: That afternoon, Mr Cheng left work early, bought some groceries at Wang Qiuyue’s place, and went back with them to take care of their son until they fell asleep together. They talked as they worked.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Mr. Cheng left work early that afternoon and bought some groceries on his way to Wang Qiyao's. They divided up the chores while they waited for the baby to fall asleep—cooking, cleaning, and talking.

chinese: 这情景持续了很长时间后，她在朦胧中想到，这可能就是她永恒的归宿了，这就是她的地狱，三个太阳构成的地狱之火将永远灼烧着她，这是她因那个超级背叛受到的惩罚。
english: This state lasted for some time, and she hazily thought it was probably the end for her. It was her hell. The fire of the three suns would torment her and burn her forever. This was punishment for her betrayal, the betrayal that exceeded all others.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The scene continued for a long time after which she realized that this was her eternal destination; it was the hell, the three suns forming the hell of hell itself burning its fire on her forever, this being the punishment for her having committed the super treason.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: After a long time, she could smell the scent of death drifting through the village. Three suns were capable of burning hot within her heart, and that was the punishment for her betrayal.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: After a long time, she drifted back into consciousness, thinking that this might be her eternal home. This was her hell, the fire of three suns burning on forever, as punishment for the great betrayal she had suffered.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The scene changed slowly over a period of some time. Suddenly she became blurry-eyed and realized that this might be her eternal home. That was the hell she deserved; three suns formed the flames of hell that would burn forever on her skin.

chinese: 下午来打针多是在三四点钟，这一小时总空着，只她们俩，面对面地坐。 夏天午间的困盹还没完全过去，禁不住哈欠连哈欠的。 她们强打精神，自己都不知说的什么。 弄口梧桐树上的蝉一迭声叫，传进来是嗡嗡的，也是不清楚。
english: Most of Wang Qiyao's patients came between three and four o'clock, so they had an hour to kill. Sitting across from each other in the lazy summer afternoon, they would stifle their yawns and chatter on without fully realizing what they were talking about, as cicadas droned in the parasol tree at the entrance to the longtang.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: In the afternoon, when it is time for injections, there is often a gap of about 30 minutes between two injections. This is all empty, just her and I, sitting side by side. The summer has not yet fully gone, and she can’t help but groggy. Summer evenings have left us exhausted, and she cannot help but groggy. She has not quite recovered from the morning nap, which still hasn’t completely passed. It is impossible to tell what was said during the night.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: In the afternoon they gave the shots early in the three o'clock time frame. While the hour was empty, a hour or two left free, the girls would stand idly by with their arms encrossled over their heads. Summer illness had yet to work its way away, and they caught odd glances from deadchairs桐树上的蝉吱吱地鸣叫着。 Nobody knew what to say.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: They came for shots around 4 or so in the afternoon. This hour was always empty. It was just them two, sitting face to face. The summer sleep had not fully passed, they could not help yawning all the time. They tried to stay awake, but they did not know what they were saying. The cicadas on the branches of a crape myrtle kept calling, it sounded like "wha-wha-who".
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: They usually came in at three or four in the afternoon, leaving the studio empty for them two women, face to face. At that hour, with the困倦刚刚过去的午睡效应, they would begin to feel sleepy, and would yawn, over and over. They tried hard to keep their eyes open, but the cicadas from the walnut tree outside seemed unable to restrain themselves and continued to chirp, their voices growing louder as they moved up the stem of the tree.

chinese: 在校园中，红卫兵、文革工作组、工宣队和军宣队，相互之间都在爆发尖锐的冲突，而每种派别的内部又时时分化出新的对立派系，捍卫着各自不同的背景和纲领，爆发更为残酷的较量。
english: Within the university, intense conflicts erupted between the Red Guards, the Cultural Revolution Working Group, the Workers' Propaganda Team, and the Military Propaganda Team. And each faction divided into new rebel groups from time to time, each based on different backgrounds and agendas, leading to even more ruthless fighting.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: In school, Red Guards, Red Brigades, the Workers' Union, and the National Guard were all fighting against each other with sharp conflicts; every faction within them constantly divided itself into new factions, defending their respective backgrounds and ideologies, resulting in more brutal confrontations.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: In the entire campus was a sharp conflict going on between Red Guards, Red Guards Workshops, and Public Enemy Alliance (the military intelligence corps); every faction sometimes split itself into opposing forces, defending their own unique background and ideological orientations.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: In the university setting, red guards, work groups, propaganda teams, and military propagandists were all clashing with each other, and within every faction there was a new division of opposition that defended its own background and program against the others. They fought even more viciously.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Within the university, Red Guards, the Worksystem of the Cultural Revolution, Revolutionary Committee for Propaganda and Education, and Revolutionary Committee for Public Security all clashed with one another, and within each of these factions internal divisions emerged, as different groups that each defended different backgrounds and goals fought one another, resulting in brutal confrontations.

chinese: 国家兴亡，匹夫有责，暂时避祸则可，但若去躲在桃花源里，逍遥自在，忍令亿万百姓在鞑子铁蹄下受苦，于心何安？
english: The citizen of a conquered country still has his duty. It's all very well to take temporary refuge, but to live a life of ease in some Peach Tree Haven while millions are suffering under the iron heel of the Tartars would be less than human.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The country's prosperity is at stake; we can be there temporarily if we hide behind a garden of flowers or live free from the shackles of government control. But if we stay in a place where people suffer under the iron fist of their enemies, how could our hearts be at peace?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Where do you want to hide when the country is in trouble?'-well, you can't stay at a far-off place like roses; your conscience won't allow you. But let us pretend to live in舒服的桃花源，and when the噩梦来临，当真的落到那芸念炎黄的铁枪和铜炮中，那可是死也不甘于命!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Responsibility for the fate of a country lies with all citizens. It is possible to temporarily avoid trouble but one must not hide away in some idyllic place, living life on the easy road. One must endure watching the suffering of millions of people at the mercy of the Tartar yoke.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Those who see themselves as responsible for their country should not shy away from facing up to the problems now confronting it. Temporal power is all that matters in the end, and hiding away in a green gourd's paradise is not going to cut it. If so doing were enough to protect them from ultimate disaster, we might question whether they were doing their duty; but it is estimated that tens of thousands of innocent souls in Russia are currently suffering under the yoke of the Tartars, and yet not a soul among them has dared to hide away rather than face up to the truth.

chinese: 他拿起一副走到车外戴上，透过镜片看到的城市夜景没有变化，只是暗了些，这时他才想起要将开关打开，立刻，城市化作一团团朦胧的光晕，大部分亮度固定，还有一些闪烁或移动着。
english: He put the glasses on and looked around. The city looked the same as before, only dimmer. Then he remembered that he had to switch them on. The city turned into many hazy glowing halos. Most were fixed, but a few flickered or moved.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: He took a pair of glasses out of his hand, then looked at the cityscape through the mirrors. The scene remained unchanged, but he realized that he needed to turn on the switch. As soon as he did, a dense fog appeared around him, mostly fixed in brightness. There were some lights moving or changing.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: He hurried up the scooter and put on the mirror, where he stared at his cityscape, which had not changed in the street. Then, as a blanket of darkness covering everything, part of the frenzied mixture of colors in the city disappeared, and most of it flickered or moved, but there were moments when particular objects or moving things would shimmer.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: He picked up a pair of sunglasses, walked out of the car, and put them on. The city scene outside the car was not as bright as before. He then realized he should turn on the light switch immediately. Immediately, the city transformed into a foggy glow. Most of its brightness remained fixed, but some parts were still moving or flashing.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: As he walked back to his place, he took off the pair of glasses and, through the lens-less viewfinder, saw that nothing had changed. He said, 'Let's turn the lights on.' And the screen suddenly lit up, most of which was fixed, with sparks of bright light here and there.

chinese: 夜色灰葡萄，金风串河道，宝蓝色的天空深邃无边，绿色的星辰格外明亮。 北斗勺子星——北斗主死，南斗簸箕星——南斗司生、八角玻璃井——缺了一块砖，焦灼的牛郎要上吊，忧愁的织女要跳河…… 都在头上悬着。
english: On that grey-purple night a golden breeze followed the course of the river. The sapphire-blue sky was deep and boundless, green-tinted stars shone brightly in the sky: the ladle of Ursa Major (signifying death), the basket of Sagittarius (representing life); Octans, the glass well, missing one of its tiles; the anxious Herd Boy (Altair), about to hang himself; the mournful Weaving Girl (Vega), about to drown herself in the river. . . .
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The night is gray with grapes, the wind blows through the river, blue skies stretch on out side of the eyes, green stars shine bright. The北斗七星——北斗主死了, the South Star —— South star was born; the eight-corner glass basin —— the one that has a stone missing from it, burning with anger for his wife, the lonely lady must be jumping off the river… They all hang above their heads.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The night turns as mauve into green, the black sky extends unboundless; the star of the River Of Gold – the constellation of current death – the Bell Pointrun of the South – the Crab of the Moon – a brick is missing – the woman of the North – she would have to jump into the river if she hung up her wedding ring – both women are mourning, unhappy, and their heads hang silently by their sides....
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Dark grapes of night, golden wind through rivers, a blue sky deep and vast, the green stars shine brightly. The spoon of the north star – death of the northern star, the箕-shaped star of south pole – life of the southern star, the glass well with eight corners – missing a brick, anxious shepherds want to hang themselves, worried weavers want to jump into the river… All hanging above their heads.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Underneath the dark green heavens, a Pocky Bridge, gilded windrows of wheat, and a deep-blue sky where even the stars seem unusually bright afford hints of what may lie in store for those who seek it—the Delimiter Pole shows that the Delimiters have fallen but the Stork Galaxy awaits birth, so the Delimiters' broken watermill indicates that there is a leak in the supporting beam that carries the mill's nameplate; moreover, the absent Guardian Star suggests that the wife of the delimiters has sunk into sorrowful melancholia about the loss of her husband, and the absent Observer Star forebodes that the wife will take her own life rather than burden herself with the pain of losing her husband.

chinese: 他想着：“兄弟们一并都有父母教训，何必我多事，反生疏了。 况且我是正出，他是庶出，饶这样看待，还有人背后谈论，还禁得辖治了他？”
english: 'We are both equally subject to our parents' control,' he would say of himself and Jia Huan. 'Why should I create a greater distance between us by trying to control him myself – especially when I am the wife's son and he is the concubine's? People already talk behind our backs, even when I do nothing. It would be ten times worse if I were to start bossing him about.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: He thought: "The brothers all have parents' lessons; why do I bother? If that were the case, we would have been good friends. And what if I am a real man, he is a peasant, and I should see things as they are, so that there would be others who talk behind his back, and still govern him?"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: That's just it,' he thought. 'Both of us will have parents' advice when we reach age; but the trouble is that I am a prospective scholar, she a commoner; and since I'm only at the beginning of my studies, compared with which they are both proficient I should be punished very reasonably. If there were such people as them to talk about and do anything else like that, I should have to put mine into practice very badly. But what I must remember is that they are only men, not women; and although they may speak ill of me publicly or私下，I am sure they shall be stopped before their words reach my mouth. And besides, even if they did do me any harm, I shouldn't feel need to deal with them publicly. '
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: He thought: "My brothers will be punished by their parents as well, why should I bother? It is more likely that I would become distant if I were to take care of this matter myself. Besides, my father is the firstborn, he has no need for a second child, so it's fine with me to look after him. But how can I allow others to speak ill of him behind my back?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Things are worse than bad in one respect: all the errors of which I might be guilty are to be shared by the rest of the clan, so that there will be no cause for feeling inferior about my own shortcomings. Besides, I am the main source from whom this blame falls, whereas the other boys can evade it because they are only庶子; whereas my being the elder is counting against me. Even if there were no忌讳， my indiscretions could not so easily get out.'

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: But even at night peace has many headcases, and among these cases is the repressed desire that one never gets to see in full bloom over the windows, where it would make for a lovely curtain. unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Deeply within the sorghum fields, the frog's wail is sad, the grasshopper's lament is mournful, and the fox's wailing is melancholic.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Deep in the sorghum fields hogs croak mournfully, snaring insects, bugs and tadpoles chirp desolately, foxes howl helplessly.

chinese: 她订了一份晚报，黄昏时间是看报度过的，报上的每一个字她都读到，懂一半，不懂一半，半懂不懂之间，晚饭的时间便到了，炉子上的水也开了。
english: She subscribed to an evening newspaper to fill the hours of dusk. She read every word in the newspaper, making sense perhaps of half the reports. By the time she finished it, the water would be boiling and it would be dinner time.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: She has a newspaper subscription and she reads it every evening at about 6:30 pm. She can read each word of every page, so half knows what they mean and half doesn't know anything. Half knew something but didn't know anything else. The water was boiling on the stove.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: She got a newspaper subscription, and while she read until her eyes grew tired, she caught every word—everything. She knew half the time, but didn't know the other half; she merely had so much time that night. Dinnertime came, and the stove would turn on at least a cup of water.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: She had ordered a newspaper for her evening reading at home. She read each word aloud as she ate dinner, half understanding, half not. By the time it was time for dinner, the water on the stove had boiled.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Wang Qiyao subscribed to a local newspaper and spent her evening reading it. She understood only half of what she read, as language prints over translations were never perfect; by the time dinner time came around, the water on the stove was already boiling.

chinese: 陈清扬一出十五队我就看见了，白天未必能看这么远。
english: I spotted Chen Qingyang as soon as she came out of the fifteenth team—I doubted if I could see that far during the day.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Yan Chengping came out of the fifteen teams last night and I saw him on the other side of the screen. The distance could be seen from time to time.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: When Chen Qingyang appeared for the fifth one-time trial I caught sight of her from noon till night.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I saw the fifteen teams when Chen Qingyang emerged, not on a sunny day.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: When Chen Qingyang left the fifteenth team, I could see her from a distance of more than fifteen kilometers, which was impressive considering that we couldn't see so much during the day.

chinese: 老头子跪在地上，哀求道：“八路老爷饶命，八路老爷饶命……”
english: He rose to his knees and begged, 'Spare me, Eighth Route Master, spare me!'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The old man was kneeling before the Eight-Counting Stars, begging for mercy: "Eight Counters have mercy on you; eight Counters have mercy on you…"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The old man crawled to his knees, pleading: 'Eight rings大哥饶命,八路兄弟们啊……'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The old man knelt down on his knees and begged: "Master of the Eight Lances, Master of the Eighth Lancer, please spare my life."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The old man on his knees pleaded, 'Eighteen linesmen, oh, eighteenth line scout, with your mercy, with your mercy!'

chinese: 那一条条一排排的里巷，流动着一些意料之外又清理之中的东西，东西不是什么大东西，但琐琐细细，聚沙也能成塔的。
english: Something is flowing through the longtang that is unpredictable yet entirely rational, small, not large, and trivial—but then even a castle can be made out of sand.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The streets that run through the town were filled with unexpected and cleaned-up items, but they weren’t big things. But the small stuff could be made into towers.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Inside these facades of blocks, some unexpected material is flowing mixed in with everything else; but even as the mixture shifts, one notices a few things that are not important: gossips about local merchants, fragments of old newspapers, remnants of wooden stakes for posts.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The alleys lined up with rows of houses were full of unexpected things that needed sorting out. They weren’t big but they added up to something.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The longtang flit with some unexpected goods and necessities; but even something as humblely insignificant as that can accumulate over time to form a tower.

chinese: 她说，女儿建议她去做整容手术。 但是她没时间做。
english: She said her daughter suggested that she have plastic surgery, but she couldn't find time to do it.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: She said that her daughter suggested she undergo plastic surgery. But she was unable to do it because she had other commitments.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: She told him that his daughter had asked him to have a facelift, but he couldn't bear it and wasn't in the mood.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: She says her daughter suggested she get a plastic surgery. But she doesn't have time for it.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: She said her daughter had suggested she get plastic surgery done, but she didn't have time for it.

chinese: 对我一刻也不能放松。
english: People shouldn't let up on me for a minute.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I cannot be relaxed for a moment.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: It's just that I have something important to do.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I can't relax for a moment.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: And I had to keep my eyes on me for the entire time.
